Summary: This job description is for a digital strategy intern at Singapore Airlines. The intern will work with the Data Strategist and gain hands-on experience in data consulting, analysis, and business insights. They will collaborate with professionals from different departments and contribute to the development of solutions using Generative AI. The key responsibilities include assisting with problem framing and data analysis, measuring business outcomes, and documenting best practices. This is a great opportunity for students interested in data analytics and real-world business challenges.

o Familiarity with data analytics tools and programming languages such as SQL, R, or Python.
The Digital Strategy Intern will assist in various projects by collecting and analyzing data, and contributing to the development of data analytics capabilities within the company. The ideal candidate should be pursuing a degree in analytics, computer science, engineering, statistics, mathematics, or a related field, with a strong interest in data analytics and business insights. They should also possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as excellent communication, collaboration, adaptability, and technical skills. A strong work ethic and willingness to learn and take on new challenges are also important qualities. Familiarity with data analysis tools and programming languages is a plus.

The Digital Strategy Internship offers hands-on experience in data strategy and analytics in the airline industry. Candidates should have a basic understanding of data analytics and Generative AI, and familiarity with design thinking and agile methodologies is a plus. Technical coding skills are preferred. This internship provides a chance to make a meaningful impact and is ideal for those passionate about data.
